verse.name: v1
c
verse.lines: Follow Thee, I will follow Thee, Follow Thee, I will follow Thee, Follow till the day is done, Follow till the crown is won, Saviour, I will follow Thee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Saviour, I will follow Thee, Tho’ it lead me to the cross; Counting all things here but dross, Savior, I will follow Thee.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Saviour, I will follow Thee, Tho’ it lead through toil and tears; Through the long and weary years, Savior, I will follow Thee.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Saviour, I will follow Thee Till the toils of life are o’er; Till I reach the Golden Shore, Saviour, I will follow Thee.
